Name: Case management
Description: State indicating that SDO is ready to send - triggered when SDO is issued
Comment: PREPARE_FOR_HEARING state name changed as part of FPLA-1920. CaseStateID naming remains to avoid break existing cases.

Name: Issue resolution
Description: Issue resolution case state - Triggered via CMO event and hearing is of issue resolution type
Comment: PREPARE_FOR_HEARING state name changed as part of FPLA-1920. CaseStateID naming remains to avoid break existing cases.

Name: Final hearing
Description: Final hearing case state - Triggered via CMO event and hearing is of final type
Comment: PREPARE_FOR_HEARING state name changed as part of FPLA-1920. CaseStateID naming remains to avoid break existing cases.
